title: Namal to carry Rajapaksa Trade Mark- Kurahan Saatakaya
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Chandana Perera & Nalin Hewapathirana) Namal Rajapaksa, elder son of President Mahinda Rajapaksa was sworn in as a MP at the inaugural session on the 7th Parliament, on 22nd April at 8.45 am. Namal contested the last general election which was held on 8th April under the…
